name: Jasmin Hollywood
text: Went yesterday to get some take out Pizza for my grandmother and kids(which they enjoyed very much). Brittany was very friendly and helpful with our orders. I will definitely be returning to this convenient location again. Thank you

text: Should have read the reviews first.  Ordered delivery online. Received a call that one of my toppings was not available.  Pizza arrived 70+ minutes later.  Very expensive, cold, and tasteless pizza.

text: I placed my order online.. My order arrived on time, hot and exactly as I wanted.
